# Notes for new design

- in: delay CV 
- pot: delay time / CV trim 
- in: feedback audio (defaults to wet out)
- pot: feedback level (for feedback input)
- in: audio in (defaults to other delay's wet output)
- out: wet output (serves as feedback source)
-----optional-----
- out: mix
- pot: wet level (into mix)


opamps
delay in: 3
feedback in: 1
audio in: 2 (incl. filter)
wet out: 1
mix out: 1
--> 2x TL074

--> See how many PT2399 we can fit in 1/2 a board. Assume SMD is OK.
Try for 3x. Perhaps double board?

This does work, but required the resistor between the potentiometer and opamp from 1k down to 100 ohm.

# Controls

jack in
jack wet
jack return (default to wet)
pot feedback (jack return to GND)
pot time
jack time

jack mix
pot mix
